short_summary: Request for proposal to supply various Spares kits for Canadian Military
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below for delivery to the Canadian Military
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: Multiple Victoria-Class Spares : Kits

## Reference Information

* Reference Number: cb-8173-68624537
* Solicitation Number: W8482-231178/B
* Amendment Number: 5
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-10-12T14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-10-12
* Expected Contract End Date: 2024-09-26

## Notice Details

* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Traditional
* Procurement Category: Goods - Defence
* Notice Status: Expired
* Trade Agreements: Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

## Tender Description

The Department of National Defence is soliciting proposals for the supply of multiple Victoria-Class spares : kits. The delivery is requested at CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax.

The requested items are:

* Item 1: Spares Kit, Valve, NSN: 20-A0Q7453, Quantity: 4, Unit of Issue: KT, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt
* Item 2: Spares Kit, Valve, NSN: 20-A0Q7453, Quantity: 1, Unit of Issue: KT, to be delivered to CFB Halifax

Bidders must indicate the brand name and model, and/or Part Number, and the NCAGE for the product proposed.

## Documentation

Documents related to this tender are available on the [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca) website.

Contact Information:
* Name: Darrell Hill
* Email: Darrell.Hill@forces.gc.ca
* Phone: (819) 939-6129

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

Please see the attachments below for the complete tender documents.
